Class ValidationUtil

    • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.utils.ValidationUtil

  • public final class ValidationUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      static void throwExceptionForInvalidImgKey(java.lang.String imgKey, boolean nullAllowed)
      Validates the image key and throws an IllegalArgumentException when it is not valid.

      Validates the sequence key and throws an IllegalArgumentException when it is not valid.
      static boolean validateImageKey(java.lang.String imgKey)
      Checks if the given image key matches the expected format (22 characters, that can be alphanumeric, - or _).

    • Method Detail

      • validateImageKey

        public static boolean validateImageKey(java.lang.String imgKey)
        Checks if the given image key matches the expected format (22 characters, that can be alphanumeric, - or _).
        Parameters:
        imgKey - the image key that should be validated
        Returns:
        true iff the image key matches the expected format or if it is null, otherwise false.

      • validateSequenceKey

        public static boolean validateSequenceKey(java.lang.String seqKey)
        Checks if the given sequence key matches the expected format (same as in validateImageKey(String)). This method is completely the same as validateImageKey(String), but I wanted to separate the validation of image and sequence keys.
        Parameters:
        seqKey - the sequence key that should be validated
        Returns:
        true iff the sequence key matches the expected format or if it is null, otherwise false.
        See Also:
        #validateImageKey(String)}

      • throwExceptionForInvalidImgKey

        public static void throwExceptionForInvalidImgKey(java.lang.String imgKey,
                                                  boolean nullAllowed)
        Validates the image key and throws an IllegalArgumentException when it is not valid.
        Parameters:
        imgKey - the image key to validate
        nullAllowed - this controls the behaviour when the key is null. If this variable is false, an IllegalArgumentException is then thrown, otherwise nothing is done.
        See Also:
        #validateImageKey(String)}

      • throwExceptionForInvalidSeqKey

        public static void throwExceptionForInvalidSeqKey(java.lang.String seqKey,
                                                  boolean nullAllowed)
        Validates the sequence key and throws an IllegalArgumentException when it is not valid.
        Parameters:
        seqKey - the sequence key to validate
        nullAllowed - this controls the behaviour when the key is null. If this variable is false, an IllegalArgumentException is then thrown, otherwise nothing is done.
        See Also:
        #validateSequenceKey(String)}
